name: The Visionary
description: Innovative, creative, and always looking towards the future.

name: The Pragmatist
description: Practical, efficient, and focused on getting things done.

name: The Empathizer
description: Compassionate, understanding, and attuned to the needs of others.

name: The Challenger
description: Bold, assertive, and unafraid to question the status quo.

name: The Mediator
description: Diplomatic, level-headed, and skilled at finding common ground.
